__Note__: This package is just for learning purpose.

Want squares, cubes, box cox and log transformation? Easy. Loading the `powers` package! 

```{r}
library(powers)
```

```{r}
num_vec <- c(1:10)
square(num_vec)
cube(num_vec)
box_cox(num_vec,4,6)
my_log(num_vec,2)
```

`apply`-family friendly, too!

```{r}
my_list <- list(1:10, 0.5, -0.7)
## So base-R-boring!
lapply(my_list, function(x) x^2)
## Use powers instead!
lapply(my_list, square)
lapply(my_list, cube)
```

It even comes with the ability to omit NA!

```{r}
num_vec <- c(1:10,NA)
square(num_vec,na.omit = TRUE)
```

Wow!!!
